thread.title: Oprah Winfrey to speak at Saratoga Springs college commencement ceremony
thread.title_full: Oprah Winfrey to speak at Saratoga Springs college commencement ceremony

author: Shannon Sweeney
title: Oprah Winfrey to speak at Saratoga Springs college commencement ceremony
text: Oprah Winfrey speaks during an interview at Bloomberg TV's "The David Rubenstein Show:… more Kholood Eid | Bloomberg Oprah Winfrey will be the speaker at Skidmore College's commencement ceremony in May. Skidmore will give Winfrey, the popular talkshow host, an Honorary Doctorate of Letters in the Arts. The college in Saratoga Springs, New York, is honoring Winfrey's dedication to accessible education. That includes the Oprah Winfrey Leadership Academy for Girls, a boarding school south of Johannesburg, South Africa. Oprah Winfrey speaks during an interview at Bloomberg TV's "The David Rubenstein Show:… more Kholood Eid | Bloomberg Winfrey has given commencement speeches at Harvard University, Stanford University and Duke University. Graduates of Winfrey's academy, which opened in 2007, have attended Skidmore. One student is a senior at the private college. Ann Tisch , founder and president of the Young Women's Leadership Network, and Wes Moore , a combat veteran and founder of BridgeEdU, will also receive honorary doctorates during the college's 106th commencement ceremony. Mark Youndt, a professor of management and business, will be the faculty commencement speaker. Skidmore College had 2,539 students enrolled in the fall semester. Shannon Sweeney covers education and workforce development. Related Content
